Our Work

What is MD Studio ?

I have been using the word "we", but it is actually "I". I am Veladzic S., founder and the only employee of freelancing design and development studio that is MD. I started front end development as a hobby, later done some freelancing work, loved doing it so much that I am looking to make it my full-time career. I am perpetually working on improving my skills and I am having a lot of fun doing so.

I believe in hands on approach so by hiring me we can together design and create modern webiste that is unique to your business and speaks volumes for potential customers.
Want a modern, responsive website ?

Contact me

My development Tools

Tools and tech I use to build modern websites are HTML, CSS with Sass, Bootstrap, JavaScript and jQuery plugins. Combining this tools with Webpack and Babel, web apps build by me are compressed, light, responsive and are fully compatible with older browser versions, thus making it accessible to wider range of users.

Courses and Projects

My Side

JavaScript Real time chatroom

In this project i learned how to connect front end part of website to google Firestore database, Firebase.

Chatroom was build using the latest ES6 features of JavaScript by coding along with Shuan Pelling a.k.a. "TheNetNinja".

GitHub Repository

JavaScript Weather App

In this project i learned all about JavaScript fetching features, XML, Async and Await, callback functions and promises and finnaly Axios.

This Weather app was build using the latest ES6 features of JavaScript by coding along with Shuan Pelling a.k.a. "TheNetNinja".

GitHub Repository

JavaScript Web Shop

In this project I coded front end logic of a web shop using the newest ES6 vannila JavaScript features.

This Web shop was build coding along with John Smiliga a.k.a "Coding Addict"

GitHub Repository
